name: Xendo
notes: Xendo is a set of Zendo cards for use with Xeno pyramids instead of the traditional Rainbow pyramids.  (Zendo cards provide possible rules for new players.)  The rule list is derived from Jacob Davenport's: http://www.playagaingames.com/games/zendo_some_rules/
csv:
Rating	Nature
1	it has a white piece and a blue piece
1	it has a white piece pointing at a white piece
1	it has an ungrounded purple medium
1	it has at least two purple pieces
1	it has exactly one purple flat piece
1	it has exactly two white pieces
2	all of the upright pieces are grounded, and there exists an upright piece
2	it has a purple or a clear piece
2	it has an equal number of white and blue pieces
2	it has an ungrounded weird piece
2	it has at least one weird piece
2	it has exactly one upright piece
2	it has is at least one color with two or more pieces
2	it has no medium pieces
2	it has no more than one piece of each color
2	it has no upright pieces
3	all flat pieces point at upright pieces, and there exists at least one flat piece
3	all of the flat pieces point at upright pieces
3	all of the white pieces are upright, and there exists at least one white piece
3	all the pieces are flat, ignoring white pieces
3	all the small pieces are white, all the medium pieces are clear, and all the large pieces are blue
3	all the upright pieces are the same size
3	all weird pieces are ungrounded, and there exists at least one weird piece
3	exactly half of the pips are from large pieces
3	it has a blue piece or a weird piece
3	it has a blue piece pointing at a flat piece
3	it has a flat large piece and an upright small piece
3	it has a flat pointed at a non-flat
3	it has a grounded clear piece or ungrounded purple piece
3	it has a grounded weird piece
3	it has a medium upright piece between two other upright pieces, all in a stack
3	it has a non-upright white piece
3	it has a piece pointed at a smaller piece
3	it has a piece that is pointing at, but not touching, a white piece
3	it has a piece touching a piece of its own size
3	it has a piece which points at a piece of a different color
3	it has a white piece pointing at a large piece
3	it has a small purple upright on top of a medium white upright, and nothing else
3	it has a three-piece tower that contains a white piece
3	it has a weird blue piece
3	it has an even number of colors represented
3	it has an odd number of medium pieces
3	it has an ungrounded blue piece pointing at a weird piece
3	it has an ungrounded flat piece
3	it has an ungrounded large, and no other large pieces
3	it has an upright clear piece
3	it has an upright piece touching a flat piece
3	it has an upright tower where the top piece is larger than all the other pieces in the tower
3	it has at least one flat and no weirds
3	it has at least one piece of every size
3	it has at least two colors with two or more pieces
3	it has at least two pieces of the same color
3	it has exactly one piece of every size
3	it has exactly one ungrounded large, and no other larges
3	it has exactly three non-purple pieces
3	it has exactly three pieces, none of which are blue
3	it has exactly three towers
3	it has exactly two non-large pieces
3	it has more blue pieces than any other color, considewhite individually
3	it has more medium pieces than large pieces
3	it has more small pieces than large pieces
3	it has no blue pieces and no small pieces
3	it has no clear pieces pointing at something
3	it has no medium upright pieces
3	it has no pieces pointing at any other piece
3	it has no pieces that both point at, and touch, another single piece
3	it has no white flat pieces
3	it has two non-white pieces
3	it has two pieces of the same size, and two pieces of the same color
3	no large pieces point at white pieces (equivalent to black if a large points at a white)
3	none of the medium pieces are white
3	the majority of the pieces are clear
3	the number of purple pieces equals the number of clear pieces
3	the total pip count is a multiple of 3
3	the total pip count is less than or equal to 4
3	the total white pip count is even and non-zero
4	a medium piece touches a flat piece
4	a piece points at exactly two other pieces
4	a white piece points at a large piece
4	a white piece points at a weird piece
4	a white piece touches a weird piece
4	all flat pieces point at upright pieces
4	all of the flat pieces are small, and there exists at least one flat piece
4	all of the clear pieces are upright, or there are no clear pieces
4	all of the weird pieces are medium, and there exists at least one medium piece
4	every piece in the koan touches exactly one other piece, which is of a different color
4	exactly half of the pieces are medium
4	exactly half of the pieces are upright
4	exactly half of the pip count comes from clear
4	exactly one-third of the pieces are purple
4	it has a blue piece pointing at something and a white piece being pointed at
4	it has a blue piece which points at, but does not touch, a small piece
4	it has a flat piece and no purple pieces
4	it has a clear piece, or both a white piece and a blue piece
4	it has a large piece and a different piece which is upright
4	it has a medium ungrounded piece or a blue piece
4	it has a non-blue medium piece or a blue piece
4	it has a piece pointing at a single blue piece and not pointing at any other pieces
4	it has a piece touching a piece of its own orientation
4	it has a piece which points at a piece of a different size
4	it has a white or clear piece pointing at another piece
4	it has a small piece touching a medium piece
4	it has a small piece touching a weird piece
4	it has a small white and an ungrounded weird piece
4	it has a weird piece but no flat pieces
4	it has a weird piece touching a blue piece
4	it has a purple touching a non-purple
4	it has an equal number of white and clear pips
4	it has an ungrounded large touching a small
4	it has an upright piece pointing at something
4	it has an upright piece with its pip-count number of pieces pointing at it
4	it has at least one piece which points at no other pieces (equivalent to black if all pieces point at something)
4	it has at least two blue pieces or at least two small pieces
4	it has exactly 4 pips of weird
4	it has exactly eight pips
4	it has exactly two orientations represented
4	it has five grounded pips
4	it has no pieces pointed at any other piece
4	it has six pips of large, or six pips of medium, or six pips of small
4	no two pieces are of the same color
4	none of the medium pieces are purple, and there are purple pieces
4	the number of purple pips equals the number of clear pips
4	the total pip count is between 4 and 7
4	the total white pip count is even
4	the total white pip count is odd
5	every piece is pointing at an even number of pieces
5	exactly half of the pieces are weird
5	it has a flat piece which points at two other pieces
5	it has a large piece which touches, but does not point at, a medium piece
5	it has a piece being pointed at and a piece not being pointed at
5	it has a piece pointing at any part of a tower containing a piece of the same size
5	it has a piece pointing at two or more different colors
5	it has a piece which points at two other pieces
5	it has a white piece or a small piece or an upright piece
5	it has a white piece, and has fewer white pieces than non-white pieces
5	it has a set of contiguously touching pieces with a total pip-count of five
5	it has a purple XOR a clear
5	it has a purple flat piece, or a small piece
5	it has an ungrounded large, and no other pieces other than smalls
5	it has at least one piece which is both pointing at another piece and being pointed at
5	it has at least two more purple pips than blue pips
5	it has exactly one more blue piece than purple pieces
5	it has exactly one piece touching nothing
5	it has exactly two colors touching the table
5	it has exactly two sizes and exactly two colors
5	it has more blue pips than clear pips
5	it has more flat pieces than purple pieces
5	it has more pips of flat than of upright
5	it has more purple pieces than flat pieces
5	the number of white plus blue pieces equals the number of clear plus purple pieces
5	the pip count of the purple pieces and blue pieces adds to exactly five
5	the total pip count is even
5	the total pip count is not a multiple of 3
5	the total pip count is odd
5	the total pip count of non-purple pieces is exactly 5
5	the total white pip count is a multiple of 3
6	any piece is touching at least two other pieces
6	each orientation represented has the same number of pieces
6	exactly one-third of the pips are from white
6	it cannot have two pieces of the same size, color, or orientation
6	it has a large XOR a small
6	it has a medium piece which points at, but does not touch, a flat piece
6	it has a medium piece which points at, but does not touch, a small piece
6	it has a piece that points at another, and all the pieces that point at other pieces do not touch their targets
6	it has a small piece which touches, but does not point at, an upright piece
6	it has any piece entirely nested within another piece
6	it has exactly four or seven pips
6	it has exactly two colors or exactly two sizes
6	it has more pieces being pointed at than pieces not being pointed at
6	it has only one piece not touching any other pieces
6	it has pieces of two different colors touching
6	no pieces are touching a piece that has the same size, color, or orientation
6	the blue pieces plus flat pieces is three, where blue flat pieces count twice
6	the number of mediums pieces plus the number of white pieces equals three
6	the number of pieces pointing at something equals the number of pieces not pointing at anything
6	the total of purple pips plus blue pips is 4
7	it has a piece that is touching as many other pieces as it has pips
7	it has a piece with any part of itself inside another piece
7	it has exactly one piece which is pointing at exactly one piece
7	it has exactly three upright pieces that are not medium
7	it has more small pieces than flat pieces, ignore blue pieces
7	the number of flat pieces equals the number of upright pips
7	the number of flat pieces equals the number of weird pips
7	the total pip count is less than 4 or greater than 7
7	the total pip count is seven, with flat pieces counting double
8	it has two pieces of the same color XOR has two pieces of the same size
8	the total pip count is prime
9	the pip count of the pieces pointing at no other pieces is three
9	the total non-blue pip count is prime
mustache:
